original_title: Sri Lanka bags Silver and Bronze medals at Asian Junior Athletic Championships 2023
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s Tharushi Karunaratne and Jayeshi Uththara have won two medals at the Asian Junior Athletic Championships 2023 currently being held in South Korea.
Accordingly, Karunaratne bagged a Silver medal, while Uththara won the Bronze medal in the Women’s 400m competition.
